TEXT.TITLE: SPECTRUM DIGITAL <SPDG> INSTALLS FIRST SYSTEM
TEXT.BODY: Spectrum Digital Corp said it installed its first multi-node ISDX T-1 multiplexer. The company said the T-1 system was installed at the University of North Carolina's Education Computing Service at Research Triangle Park, N.C. Reuter
